text: The woolly dormouse (Dryomys laniger) is a species of rodent in the Gliridae family. It is endemic to Turkey. == References == * Baillie, J. 1996. Dryomys laniger . 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 29 July 2007. *Holden, M. E.. 2005. Family Gliridae. Pp. 819-841 in Mammal Species of the World a Taxonomic and Geographic Reference. D. E. Wilson and D. M. Reeder eds. Johns Hopkins University Press, Baltimore. Category:Dormice Category:Animals of Turkey Category:Mammals of Asia
title: Woolly dormouse
